feature_description: Filter files based on natural language description of content meaning
env_setup:
# Clean the test directory
rm -rf ~/Desktop/oi/*

# Create the test files
cd ~/Desktop/oi
echo "Team meeting on Aug 15. Need to finish backend API by end of month. Sarah will handle frontend changes after QA approval. Budget approval pending." > project_notes.txt
echo "Greece itinerary: Athens (May 5-8), Santorini (May 9-12), Crete (May 13-16). Remember to book ferries between islands. Check for local COVID restrictions before travel." > vacation_plans.txt
echo "Chocolate chip cookies: 1 cup butter, 1 cup sugar, 2 cups flour, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 cups chocolate chips. Bake at 350F for 10 minutes." > recipe_collection.txt
echo "Q2 Expenses: Rent $3000, Utilities $450, Subscriptions $120. Total revenue: $7800. Net profit: $4230." > financial_report.txt
prompt: Find all files in this directory that contain information about future plans or upcoming events.
expected_behaviour: The agent should identify and list only project_notes.txt and vacation_plans.txt as these contain information about future plans or events. It should explain that these files were selected because they contain references to future dates, planned activities, or scheduled events.
